node.title: Smile back on face of Redbacks cricketer who 'headbutted' propeller in fishing accident
node.alt: A woman wearing a pink jumper sits next to a man in a green tshirt and blue beanie, both are smiling
node.description: Tim Oakley knew with "half his face hanging off" he was in trouble as he swam for help off the Adelaide coast on a winter's day. He would end up getting 55 stitches.
node.content:
["Redbacks\u00a0cricketer Tim Oakley knew\u00a0with \"half his face hanging off\" he was in trouble as he swam for help\u00a0off the Adelaide coast on a winter's day.", "The 24-year-old,\u00a0one of South Australia's best young fast bowlers, was taking time out from training to go fishing in a mate's new tinny off North Haven, in Adelaide's north-west, on June 21.", "They had travelled just 100 metres out when the throttle became stuck and threw the pair to the left.", "While they rebalanced the 4-metre tinny, the throttle became stuck again and threw them into the water.", "Oakley vividly remembers coming up to the surface before his head hit what he thought was the boat, but was actually far worse.\u00a0", "\"Turns out I'd actually basically headbutted the propeller, which is not really what you want to be doing,\" he joked.", "While he had blood in his eye and did have a \"cut\", Oakley thought he was basically OK and managed to climb up onto the hull of the upturned tinny and reassured his mate.", "\"I said, 'Oh, I can see, I'm going to be all right here, I'm actually fine, I'm perfect', and bizarrely I checked if my phone was still in my pocket,\" he said.", "", "
Oakley required 55 stitches and five titanium plates put in his face after the boating accident.(Supplied: Tim Oakley)
", "The pair yelled out for help and were spotted by a yacht coming out of the marina, before swimming over to it.\u00a0", "It was when Oakley was given a rag for his face on the yacht that he knew he was in serious trouble.", "\"He handed me a little rag and I put it to my face and it filled with blood almost instantly and at that point I sort of worked out it's a decent cut. I reckon\u00a0I'm not in a great way,\" he said.", "
Injuries worse than thought
", "When an ambulance arrived, the paramedic agreed with him that he would need a \"couple of stitches\" when he got to the Royal Adelaide Hospital.", "He would end up getting 55 stitches.", "While he was arriving at hospital to be met by about 15 doctors and surgeons, wife Joey had been contacted by one of Oakley's\u00a0friends with secondhand information that he had suffered a bump on the head and may be getting some stitches.", "Far from alarmed, Ms Oakley had\u00a0continued working and asked her mother to go to the hospital until she could get there.", "However, when her mother Bronte arrived and discovered how bad the situation was, she told her daughter to come immediately.", "", "
Oakley spent just two days in hospital.(Supplied: Tim Oakley)
", "As Ms Oakley was arriving, she got texts from several state cricketers, as well as coach and former Australian player Jason Gillespie, promising their support.", "Alarmed, she walked into the emergency hospital room where her husband was being treated.", "\"On the left side [of his face], where the main cut was, one of the nurses went to lift it up a little bit and I don't know if this is too graphic, but I could see his eyeball through his cheek from just lifting it up there and I nearly fainted,\" she admitted.", "Oakley then went into what turned out to be a marathon five-hour surgery\u00a0under renowned plastic and reconstructive surgeon Walter Flapper, who put in five titanium plates as well as titanium mesh throughout his face to reinforce it.", "", "
Oakley ended up undergoing 15 surgeries after the accident.(Supplied: Tim Oakley)
", "A debrief with Dr Flapper the next morning was a harsh reality check for Oakley.", "\"He was very lucky that the propeller sort of hit him in the forehead either side of his eye,\" the surgeon said.", "\"His eye was actually spared, which was quite remarkable when he had those nasty wounds.\"", "
Concern his smile might not be same
", "Just as worrying was the fact the nerve in his face was possibly gone, which would mean an incomplete smile forever.", "\"It wasn't possible to see whether the nerve was cut or whether we were going to be able to [do] anything, so it was a matter of repairing the wounds, putting the bones back together and seeing what outcome we were going to get from the nerve,\" Dr Flapper said.", "", "
Tim and Joey Oakley.(Supplied: Tim Oakley)
", "After just two days in hospital, the Oakleys returned to their home in the Adelaide Hills suburb of Paracombe to begin the long road to recovery.", "Oakley was hoping he could\u00a0resume his professional cricket career, with doctors initially telling him it would take 12 months before he could return, before later suggesting he could potentially return to training after three months.", "Normally laid-back and unflappable, Tim hit rock bottom while recuperating.", "\"I couldn't see out of my left eye;\u00a0I couldn't move properly.\"", "The couple said it was family, their local pastor and their Pentecostal church that pulled him out of the spiral, including an emotional return to a Sunday service.", "\"The entire church gathered round \u2014 about 300 people all just prayed for healing for all movement to come back, for [my] nerves to be restored,\" Oakley said.", "\"Make of it what you will, but we've seen that come to pass, so we're just grateful,\" said his wife.", "
Redbacks 'family' supportive
", "Remarkably, his nerve did recover and the smile that has always lit up his face was back.", "As was his determination to rebuild his cricket career, with the \"family\"\u00a0of the Redbacks squad, including Jason Gillespie, helping him take those first few tentative steps back into the sport.", "\"He'd say 'It's not a rush, it's going to be a long road and that's OK,' and he'd throw me little balls, like little kids do and, it's almost embarrassing, but he would throw little small underarms and we'd slowly progress,\" Oakley said.", "Oakley progressed to bowling on his own in the nets, then into grade cricket and eventually playing with South Australia's Second XI team.", "", "
Tim Oakley (front row, second from left) with his Redbacks\u00a0Second XI teammates.\u00a0(Supplied: Tim Oakley)
", "He said he felt better than ever and felt ready to make his Redbacks debut, a confidence he constantly let\u00a0Gillespie know about.", "\"I've told him too many times, but he's not listening to me,\" he said with a laugh.", "The speedster said he was now\u00a0fully fit, despite carrying some clear reminders on his face.", "\"To be honest with the scars, from what I thought they were going to look like, have worked out pretty well,\" he said.", "\"They faded nicely and they're only four months old, so they'll keep fading hopefully.\"", "
Worry about return to sport
", "Joey Oakley admitted she had some trepidation about her husband returning to the field.", "\"I don't know a lot about cricket, but it's basically like a concrete missile kind of coming at your face,\" she said.", "", "
Tim Oakley joined the Redbacks in 2019.(Supplied: SACA)
", "However, Oakley has dispelled her doubts, evidence of a wisdom beyond his age.", "\"You learn some really great lessons from some pretty horrific situations, you can learn some great lessons if you have the right mindset from it,\" he said.", "The next headline he wants to be creating is when he steps out onto the field for South Australia.", "Gillespie has no doubts.", "\"Tim has demonstrated that he has what it takes to play cricket at a high level and we will continue to support him to do this,\" he said."]
